abort.already_configured: You have already configured this device!

error.unexpected_error: Unexpected error. See logs for detail
error.no_local_access: Local access is not supported on this device. Cloud Access has been enabled. Click 'SUBMIT' again.
error.no_connect_warning: Failed to discover your device. If it is a Xiaomi Speaker, it is normal and you need to enter its model manually above. If not, please check your input.
error.account_tips:
This is to facilitate adding devices. 
After logging in, come back here to select devices to add.

user.description:
Log in your Xiaomi account for a faster way to add devices.
Not all devices in the list are supported yet.
user.title: Select Operation

abort.no_configurable_account:
No options available for the account.
To log out, use **Delete**. This will not affect added devices.
To refresh devices list, use **Reload**.

account.description:
Select which server are your devices in.
To log out, use **Delete**. This will not affect added devices.
To refresh devices list, use **Reload**.
To add devices, use'Add Integration'-'Xiaomi MIoT' instead of 'Batch add devices'.
account.title: Account options

sensor.description: If checked, there will be a sensor entity for each attribule.
sensor.title: Sensor options

cover.description: Reversing position percentage can fix some problems.
cover.title: Cover options

climate.description: Enter a entity ID of temperature sensor here to use it as the current temperature sensor.
climate.title: Climate options

select_devices.description:
Select devices to add.

After submitting, devices will be added in background. Refresh to see them.
select_devices.title: Batch adding devices

batch_agreement.description:
You can select multiple devices and add them with a single click.
After submitting, devices will be added in background. This takes up to 1 minute.
If some devices doesn't work properly, delete them and add them manually by "Add Integration".
Devices added in this way are integrated by **Cloud**. If they support LAN access, delete them and add them manually by "Add Integration".
batch_agreement.title: Please read these instructions
